name: Doce Sonhar
description:
Doce Sonhar is a RPG, Puzzle, Exploration and Drama game focused on the story of the main character (unnamed) and his family.

You are a little girl with pink hair, lonely and quite depressive. You has been going through many bad situations since you were a child.

You just woke up in your beautiful bedroom. Deep down you've noticed that something has changed. When you leave your bedroom, you are surprised, maybe today is a happy day.

---------------------------------------------

I would like to receive feedback of what you think of the game, how i can improve etc. Well, I would like to finish this game later this year.

Thanks!
